delete_account_screen.title: Delete Account
delete_account_screen.description:
You can easily delete your account by contacting us through the "Contact Us". Please note that all your data, including saved posts and any content you've created, will be permanently removed. This action is irreversible, so ensure you've saved any important information.


Thank you for using EVERSHOP. Your data privacy is important to us.
